lead_paragraph: Captain Kane Williamson and Neil Broom both flirted with centuries as New Zealand cruised to an eight-wicket victory over Bangladesh in their third one-day international to complete a 3-0 series sweep at Saxton Oval in Nelson on Saturday.

headline.print_headline: Broom, Williamson Guide New Zealand to Series Sweep
headline.main: Broom, Williamson Guide New Zealand to Series Sweep

snippet: Captain Kane Williamson and Neil Broom both flirted with centuries as New Zealand cruised to an eight-wicket victory over Bangladesh in their third one-day international to complete a 3-0 series sweep at Saxton Oval in Nelson on Saturday....
